title: Geo Circle
description: A circular region of a particular radius centered on a GeoCoordinate.

xdm:id.title: Identifier
xdm:id.description: The unique identifier of the circle.

xdm:description.title: Description
xdm:description.description: A description of what the circle contains.

xdm:radius.title: Radius
xdm:radius.description: The length of the radius of the circle. This value conforms to the WGS84 datum and is measured in meters.
